en.title: Teaching Assistant – Calculus & Statistics
en.text: Supported undergraduate students in calculus and business statistics by translating mathematical theory into applied, data-driven examples relevant to analytics and machine learning.
list: Conducted weekly tutorials for calculus and statistics courses
Explained probability, hypothesis testing, and optimization concepts using real datasets
Provided one-on-one academic support and constructive grading feedback
Collaborated with faculty to improve student engagement and learning outcomes

en.title: Data Science Tutor & Technical Mentor
en.institution: University of Regina – Student Success Centre
en.text: Mentored students in core computer science and data science foundations, bridging academic concepts with practical, industry-relevant workflows.
list: Tutored Python, data structures, algorithms, linear algebra, and calculus
Guided students in data manipulation, debugging, and problem decomposition
Helped students apply theory to projects and interview-style problems
Improved student confidence in technical coursework and assessments

en.title: Data Scientist Intern
en.text: Built a machine learning–driven house price prediction system to support data-informed real estate valuation and decision-making.
list: Developed regression and ensemble ML models for property price prediction
Performed feature engineering and geospatial analysis on real estate data
Automated preprocessing pipelines using Python and Pandas
Created Power BI dashboards to communicate insights to stakeholders

en.title: Python Developer Intern
en.text: Developed and optimized a web-based healthcare management system to improve operational efficiency and data accuracy.
list: Built backend features using Python, Django, and PostgreSQL
Designed REST APIs for inventory tracking and notifications
Implemented authentication, access control, and data security
Improved system performance through refactoring and testing

en.title: Project Management Intern
en.text: Supported project coordination and documentation for cross-functional teams in a structured, deadline-driven environment.
list: Maintained project documentation and progress reports
Assisted in task coordination and stakeholder communication
Supported agile workflows and sprint planning
Ensured alignment between technical tasks and project goals
